member.name: T:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator
member.summary: Provides basic and advanced mathematical operations.

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Add(System.Double,System.Double)
member.returns: The sum of the two numbers.

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Subtract(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Subtracts the second number from the first number.
member.returns: The difference between the two numbers.

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Multiply(System.Double,System.Double)
member.returns: The product of the two numbers.

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Divide(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Divides the first number by the second number.
member.exception: Thrown when the second number is zero.

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Sin(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the sine of an angle.

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Cos(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the cosine of an angle.

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Tan(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the tangent of an angle.

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Log(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the base-10 logarithm of a number.
member.returns: The base-10 logarithm of the number.

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Sqrt(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the square root of a number.
member.returns: The square root of the number.

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Power(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Raises a number to a specified power.
member.returns: The result of raising the base number to the specified power.

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.DegreeToRadian(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts an angle from degrees to radians.
